meta_data.description: 2400 Sq. Ft. - Rent 4 BHK Apartment / Flat in ATS Rhapsody, Sector 1 Greater Noida West * 27 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished * - 5th floor (out of 29). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: This lovely 4 bhk apartment for rent in sector 1 greater noida west is available in one of greater noida's most popular projects, ats rhapsody. This property offers access to nearby landmarks and is close to school and close to hospital. Property has attached 4 bathrooms & more than 3 balconies with 4 rooms set in 2400 sq.Ft. Carpet area. This flat is constructed on 2400 sq.Ft. Area. An independent servant room is available in this property. This flat lies on the 5th floor of a 29 storey building. Well maintained 0-1 year property. This is a semi-Furnished flat. Already installed 21 light, 5 fan, 3 wardrobe, 2 geyser, 1 water purifier, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney, 1 curtains and 1 exhaust fan. Property will be leased for 11 months from sun, 16 nov 2025 to family only with a notice of 6 months for a duration of 11 months. The expected rent is 50,000 monthly and is negotiable. Electricity & water charges are excluded. Security deposit of 50000 is required. This flat has all latest feature like reserved parking, feng shui / vaastu compliant, piped-Gas, intercom facility, power back-Up, water storage, security / fire alarm, high ceiling height, false ceiling lighting, centrally air conditioned, water purifier, recently renovated, private garden / terrace, natural light, airy rooms and spacious interiors. Society provides modern lifestyle facilities like swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, cctv surveillance, lift(s), water softening plant, maintenance staff, visitor parking and security personnel. There are more things to like about this property such as rain water harvesting, separate entry for servant room, waste disposal, no open drainage around, bank attached property, low density society, pet friendly, wheelchair friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat is facing towards north-East. The flat has polished concrete flooring.
